original_text: Their land also is full of idols; they worship the work of their own hands, that which their own fingers have made:
korean_text: 그 땅에는 우상도 가득하므로 그들이 자기 손으로 짓고 자기 손가락으로 만든 것을 경배하여

sentences.original_text: Their land also is full of idols
they worship the work of their own hands
that which their own fingers have made
